item.description: According to the predictions of the Family Radio ministry, disaster will befall the world on May 21st. Being rational people, we know that Apocalypse or not, people still gotta eat, so we're going to have brunch the morning after. (Read more about these predictions at http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1363837/Doomsday-campers-Project-Caravan-say-world-end-May-21.html.)
item.why: ... after Judgment Day, we're probably going to be hungry. We can regroup, and delegate responsibilities as we begin to plan to rebuild civilization.
item.name: Post-Judgment Day Recovery Brunch
